name: WP-Personality
author: Blake Peterman

sections.description:
This is a serviceware plugin. It gets a line of text from my server and outputs it onto your admin panel. Meant to make everyones day a little brighter. ðŸ™‚

If you have suggestions for the “personality” let me know at http://blakepeterman.com/wp-personality/suggest
sections.installation:
1. Upload personality.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
v1.3: Removed trunk folder.

v1.2: Added a part to the description for suggesting content.

v1.1: added a readme, also clarified that this is a serviceware plugin.

short_description: Gets a funny string from my server and displays it in the WordPress admin panel.  Hopefully makes everyones day a little better.
